column3: Social Studies Content Standard 4 - Time, Continuity, and Change
column5: Students analyze events, people, problems, and ideas within their historical contexts.

column3: Social Studies Content Standard 2 - Culture and Cultural Diversity
column5: Students demonstrate an understanding of the contributions and impacts of human interaction and cultural diversity on societies.
